description: [Hancitor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0499) has decoded Base64 encoded URLs to insert a recipientâ€™s name into the filename of the Word document. [Hancitor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0499) has also extracted executables from ZIP files.(Citation: Threatpost Hancitor)(Citation: FireEye Hancitor)
